example.question: Temperature changes along the coast are usually less extreme than temperature changes farther inland. Which of the following statements best explains why?

text: It is much windier at the coast than farther inland.
The temperature of the land remains fairly constant.
It is much less humid at the coast than farther inland.
The temperature of the ocean remains fairly constant.

prompt:
Accurately answer the following question:

Temperature changes along the coast are usually less extreme than temperature changes farther inland. Which of the following statements best explains why?

Choices:
A. It is much windier at the coast than farther inland.
B. The temperature of the land remains fairly constant.
C. It is much less humid at the coast than farther inland.
D. The temperature of the ocean remains fairly constant.


Instructions:
- Carefully read the question and all options.
- Select the single most correct answer.
- Respond ONLY in the following format: "The correct answer is A/B/C/D".
- Do not include any explanations, additional text, or punctuation besides the answer.

The correct answer is
